message.body: I had a dream that #### told me he loved me
And then my mom made him feel bad for the way he treated me once and he broke up with me
And I've been thinking about ###### lately and idk why
What have you been thinking about exactly?
Just wondering what he's doing how he's doing if he's changed idk
Oh but are you missing the relationship?
No. I'm happy with ##### I'm just idk upset that our relationship ended so badly
I'm wondering if it's my fault at least partly
Like if I'm a bad girlfriend and if I'm going to ruin this relationship, too
I dont remember it being your fault
But then why would he be doing better now
Where'd you hear that again?
And just because he's doing better doesn't mean you were the problem
It just looks like he is. I kind of stalked him on fb. We aren't fb friends anymore but some of his stuff is public
Facebook doesn't really tell you how someone's doing. But regardless, it doesn't make anything your fault
But then why would he be doing better without me
There could be plenty of other factors.
Like what
I don't know? Time... A good counselor... Jesus?
Idky I keep thinking of him. I feel also like that's not fair to ####?
If you're not thinking about him romantically/sexually, I think it's fine
Definitely not sexually but I am dwelling on our relationship
